name: simple-cron
description: The Dynamic Cron Scheduler is a simple Node.js package for scheduling tasks using intuitive, natural language terms. This package allows developers to schedule recurring tasks or one-time events using easy-to-understand English phrases, removing the complexity of traditional cron syntax.

scripts.test: ng plain English such as "every 5 minutes," "on 5th of every month 22:30," or "from 25th March 2024 22:00 to 26th March 2024 22:30."
